name: Stand Up
content: From the moment I met you
I knew I had to get you
我知道我一定要得到你
I had to take you and make you mine
我必须追到你 并且让你成为我的
I would walk through the desert
I would walk down the isle
我愿意游过所有海洋只为看见你的微笑
What ever it takes It's fine
无论发生什么都无所谓
无论发生什么都无所谓
直到偷走了你的心我才离开
I know your hearts been broken
I'll be there yeah i know it
直到偷走了你的心之后才离开
直到偷走了你的心之后才离开
And now the stealers have come
And we will drive to the stars
I will give you the moon
It's the least i could do
If you give me the chance
I'm a thief i'm a thief
You can call me a thief
I'm a thief i'm a thief
But does she know your gone
I'm a thief i'm a thief
I'm a thief i'm a thief
I'm a thief i'm a thief
直到偷走了你的心之后我才离开
